translation.MANAGE_BARBER_SHOP:
Manage your barbershop
with Barber Master.
translation.ADMIN_DESCRIPTION: Transform the management of your barbershop and coordinate your team more efficiently and integratively.
translation.WELCOME_BACK_MESSAGE:
Welcome back!
Enter your login credentials to access the application.
translation.PASSWORD_INVALID_MESSAGE: Password must contain at least 1 number, 1 lowercase letter, 1 uppercase letter, and 1 special character.
translation.PASSWORD_LENGTH: Your password must be at least 8 characters long.
translation.PASSWORD_MISMATCH: The password confirmation does not match
translation.PRIVACY_POLICY_TEXT:
By using this Application, you agree to
the Terms and Privacy Policy.
translation.NAME: Name
translation.ENTER_EMAIL:
Enter your e-mail and verify your e-mail after pressing 'Create Account'
to use the necessary token in the next step.
translation.REGISTRATION_MESSAGE: After pressing 'Create Account', check your e-mail for the token you will need to enter in the next step.
translation.EMAIL_ALREADY_REGISTERED_DESCRIPTION: Oops! It looks like this email is already in use. Please try with a different email or log in if it's already yours.
translation.UNKNOWN_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
translation.CODE_SENT_MESSAGE:
We just sent a 6-digit code to the email address [EMAIL].

Please enter the code below:
translation.INCOMPLETE_FIELDS_MESSAGE: Please fill in all fields to continue. üòä
translation.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_RENEW_SUCCESS_DESCRIP:
A new verification code has been sent to your email.

Check your inbox and enter the new code to complete the process.
translation.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: The code has been verified successfully. You can now log in to the application.
translation.PASSWORD_REQUIREMENTS: Your password must include at least 1 number, 1 lowercase letter, 1 uppercase letter, and 1 special character.
translation.INVALID_PHONE: Invalid phone number. The number must contain exactly 11 digits.
translation.EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS_NOT_VERIFIED_DESCRI: It looks like you haven't verified your email yet. Please check your inbox and enter the code to continue.
translation.EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS_VERIFIED_DESCRIPTIO: Your email is already verified! Please log in to access your account.
translation.ESTABLISHMENT_CREATION_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTI: Your establishment has been successfully registered. You can now manage it from your dashboard.
translation.PHONE_ESTABLISHMENT_ALREADY_EXISTS_TITLE: Phone Already Registered to Another Establishment
translation.PHONE_ESTABLISHMENT_ALREADY_EXISTS_DESCR: The phone number is already associated with an existing establishment. Please use a different phone number.
translation.NAME_ESTABLISHMENT_PLH: Enter the name of the establishment
translation.ADDR_ESTABLISHMENT_PLH: Enter the address of the establishment
translation.PLEASE_ENTER_NAME_ESTABLISHMENT: Please enter the name of the establishment
translation.PLEASE_ENTER_ADDRESS_ESTABLISHMENT: Please enter the address of the establishment
translation.PLEASE_ENTER_PHONE_ESTABLISHMENT: Please enter the establishment's telephone number
translation.TOKEN_NOT_FOUND_DESCRIPTION: The token you provided is incorrect or has expired. ‚è≥ Please check your email and try again üìß or request a new verification code üîÑ.
translation.PLEASE_ENTER_EMPLOYEE_VALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address.
translation.PLEASE_ENTER_EMPLOYEE_VALID_ROLE: Please select a valid role. Valid values are: BARBER.
translation.PLEASE_ENTER_EMPLOYEE_PHONE: Please enter the employee's phone number.
translation.PLEASE_ENTER_EMPLOYEE_PHONE_MAX_LENGTH: The phone number must contain exactly 11 digits.
translation.PLEASE_ENTER_EMPLOYEE_VALID_PHONE_NUMBER: Please enter a valid phone number.
translation.REGISTER_EMPLOYEE_MESSAGE: Register a new employee to start managing them! üë§
translation.YOU_MUST_SELECT_THE_ESTABLISHMENT_MESSAG: You must select an establishment before proceeding. Please choose one! üè¢
translation.EMPLOYEE_CREATION_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: The employee was successfully created. You can now manage their information. ‚úÖ
